attributes.action: Shorten the 6 weeks summer holiday to 3 weeks
attributes.background: Make the 6 weeks summer holiday shorter down to 3 weeks instead of 6 and spread the remaining 3 weeks throughout the rest of the year many parents think that 6 weeks is too long for a school holiday especially with children with special needs such as autism and adhd

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.
